FuncDef:
The ipv6 filter-policy export command configures IS-IS to filter imported IPv6 routes before route advertisement.
The undo ipv6 filter-policy export command disables such filtering. The ipv6 filter-policy export command configures IS-IS to filter imported IPv6 routes before route advertisement. The undo ipv6 filter-policy export command disables such filtering. By default, IS-IS does not filter imported IPv6 routes before route advertisement. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: ipv6 filter-policy { <acl6-number> | acl6-name <acl6-name-string> | ipv6-prefix <ipv6-prefix-name> | route-policy <route-policy-name> } { export [ direct | static | ripng <process-id> | bgp | ospfv3 <process-id> | isis <process-id> ] }

undo ipv6 filter-policy [ <acl6-number> | acl6-name <acl6-name-string> | ipv6-prefix <ipv6-prefix-name> | route-policy <route-policy-name> ] { export [ direct | static | ripng <process-id> | bgp | ospfv3 <process-id> | isis <process-id> ] }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a basic ACL6 number.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the name of a named basic ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of an IPv6 address prefix list.
The value is a string of 1 to 169 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the name of a route-policy to filter routes based on tags and other protocol parameters.
The value is a string of 1 to 200 case-sensitive characters without spaces. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Specifies to filter the imported direct routes before route advertisement.
-

Specifies to filter the imported static routes before route advertisement.
-

Specifies the ID of an RIPng process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies to filter the imported BGP routes before route advertisement.
-

Specifies the OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
